description:
Bartolomeo and Tama look back on Luffy’s battle against Kaido, one of the Four Emperors of the Sea. They explain how Luffy got knocked out, got back on his feet, and became stronger to take down Kaido and free the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy-senpai Ouen Kikaku! Barto no Himitsu no Heya Third!
Luffy-senpai Support Project! Barto`s Secret Room 3!
Unterstützungsprojekt für Meister Ruffy! – Bartos geheimes Kämmerchen 3!
Épisode spécial. Le jardin secret de Barto, partie 3 !
ルフィ先輩応援企画! バルトの秘密の部屋3[サード]!
